mapper.select: select id , cust_code , prod_code , prod_count from tb_cust_prod where 1=1

select a.id as a_id , a.code as a_code , a.name as a_name , a.desc as a_desc , b.id as b_id , b.cust_code as b_cust_code , b.prod_code as b_prod_cude , b.prod_count as b_prod_count , c.id as c_id , c.code as c_code , c.name as c_name , c.desc as c_desc , c.price as c_price , c.price * b.prod_count as kang from tb_cust as a , tb_cust_prod as b , tb_prod as c where 1=1 and b.cust_code = a.code and c.code = b.prod_code
